landing.title: EventLane
landing.subtitle: The fast lane for your events.
landing.stepsDescription: Three simple steps to manage your events
landing.step1Description: Add a title and capacity. That's it. No lengthy forms or complicated setup.
landing.step2Description: Get your unique URL instantly. Share anywhere — email, social, messaging.
landing.step3Description: Real-time updates, automatic waitlists, and instant capacity adjustments.

features.title: Everything you need to manage your events
features.subtitle: Powerful features that make event management effortless
features.fastRsvpsDesc: One-click RSVP system with passwordless authentication. Your attendees can confirm in seconds.
features.capacityControlDesc: Set your event capacity and let EventLane handle the rest. Overflow goes to waitlist automatically.
features.realTimeUpdatesDesc: See changes instantly with WebSocket-powered live updates. No refresh needed.
features.multipleAdminsDesc: Share admin access with your team. Everyone stays in sync with real-time collaboration.
features.smartNotificationsDesc: Automated email notifications keep everyone informed about status changes and updates.
features.passwordlessLoginDesc: Secure Firebase authentication with magic links. No passwords to remember or manage.
